Text.val: 25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
11.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURH by CUHA
17.01.2008 SH SCR13294 Added TREP_JOURNALNO (segment of PK)
04.04.2006 SH SCR10790 BXA018B Added <header_id>
01.06.2004 SH SCR6318 If no TPEC rows are selected in task "write to xml/detail"
- then no XML will be produced and no TPEC updates will be performed
02.04.2004 SH SCR5860 Diff. changes to increase performance
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
02.02.2004 SH SCR5437 Fixed bug to get the next highest date, see SCR for detail
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with 0
27.10.2003 RR SCR4644 Extended condition regarding table TPEC
25.03.2003 SH SCR2276 Replaced table TEMP_REPORT from %TEMP% by
- TEMP_REPORT from %FACTORLINK(TEMP)% and write the Session_ID to table
- this enables a multiinstance using of this temp table
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
24.01.2003 SH SCR2811 BXA018A --> built additional totals which have to be
- written with BXA018B to XML and also per TPEC_CURRENCY the exchanges
- rates will be written to XML
22.10.2002 SH SCR2393 Add new argument to end of list for call to BXA900
13.05.2002 SH SCR95 Wrap any output with UFB535, to replace special XML-Charater
13.05.2002 SH SCR759 Implemented errorhandling and a proper handling of
- directories for Templates and Outputfiles
08.04.2002 SH SCR1069 The totals which write to XML/TOTAL included now
- decimals, Model 114 will be now used for this amounts
07.03.2002 SH SCR952 Set Allow Event to 'N', all tasks
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Trigger to perfom further XML processing, only if TPEC rows were selected in
task "write to xml / detail"
-- Reset variables
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- Write firstable the detail part, because if no TPEC rows were selected no XML
report has to be produced
-- Perform further XML handling only if min. one TPEC row was selected in the
previous performed task
-- Build final XML File
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- The two following temp XML files have to be deleted always, because if no
TPEC rows were selected in task "write to xml / detaik" the files were
created without any contents
-- Get highest Exchange rate --> Sort = DESCENDING
-- Get highest Exchange rate - (1 Month) --> Sort = DESCENDING
-- Write the exchange rates to XML per TPEC_CURRENCY
-- If min. one TPEC was selected in current task, then the further XML
processing has to be performed in the parent task, otherwise it could
happened that a report without detail contents will be produced

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT TPEC_ADMNO, TPEC_CLNTNO FROM :1/TPEC WHERE TPEC_JOURNALNO=0 GROUP BY TPEC_ADMNO, TPEC_CLNTNO ORDER BY TPEC_ADMNO, TPEC_CLNTNO FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS
